mapper.select: SELECT usrFav.usr_id as usrId, dealersDet.product_name as productName, dealersDet.product_id as productId, cat.category_id as categoryId, cat.category_name as categoryName, cat.category_name_reading as categoryNameReading, dealersDet.price as price, dealers.takuban as takuban, dealers.dealer_name as dealerName, dealers.dealer_id as dealerId FROM wfs.usr_detail_fav_products usrFav inner join wfs.dealers_detail_products dealersDet on ( usrFav.dealer_id=dealersDet.dealer_id and usrFav.product_id=dealersDet.product_id) inner join wfs.dealers_detail_products_categories dealersDetCat on ( dealersDet.dealer_id = dealersDetCat.dealer_id and dealersDet.product_id = dealersDetCat.product_id ) inner join wfs.categories cat on (dealersDetCat.category_id = cat.category_id) inner join wfs.dealers dealers on (usrFav.dealer_id=dealers.dealer_id) WHERE usrFav.usr_id = #{userId}
